GTG. G'night.

::Zardus::

Zardus watches Wheeljack's enthusiasm, remembering when he had been 
assigned the exact same tast from his leader. When he had landed on 
the planet and joined the Predacons, his first assignment was to 
improve the defence field. He knew he'd have to oversee Wheeljack and 
Composer, but he could do that fairly simply.

Zardus activates his comm-link. "Gotron, can you report to my 
position? I might have an assignment for you."




--- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> OOC: I've been an expert on Dinosaurs since Nursery School, so id 
have to 
> agree with Soulstice.  Raptors were only about 3 feet tall.
> 
> :::The Protectrons/Torca/Ratchet/Sideswipe/Sky 
Lynx/Orion/Wheeljack:::
> 
> Torca: Yes, im Torca, and Iron Raptor is still leader.  Deemos?  If 
your 
> talking about the cowardly leader of the Chosen Mafia, hes still 
alive.
> ::All of my Maximals hear the transmission::
> Hardhead: Damn, whats with all the battles?
> Chromedome: Shut up Hardhead, we're Maximals now, and that means we 
will help 
> them when they are in need.
> Sideswipe: You know, hes right.
> Ratchet: Yeah, the war has been escalating recently...
> ::Ratchet fuels some shuttles, with them teaming up in groups of 
three.  
> Torca, Orion, and Highbrow get in to one, Ratchet, Sideswipe, and 
Sky Lynx 
> get into another, and Chromedome, Hardhead, and Brainstorm get into 
the last 
> one and they get ready to take off::
> ~~~~~
> ::Wheeljack smiled at Composer's enthusiasm::
> Wheeljack: Alrighty then!  Composer, follow me.
> ::He heads to the controls of the sheilds and everything else and 
waits for 
> Composer::
